Summary: standing and waiting for the train star like object slowly flying over towards the park, flew over Helicopter.
divs: sighting detailshi, i have reported seeing ufos in the past under a former name [cms\tg\pid], ive had numerous experiences in the last 20 years. this morning on 06\11\2010, i left my home early to go to work and my way return a product i purchased from the apple store on 59 street they are open 24 hours, i while i left my house about 4:05 am, the train station stop is burhe ave stations elevated. i walked towards the front platform as i always take the first car. i hung my book bag on the railing so i can hook my house keys in my back pack, and then i just looked up into the early evening sky and there it was, at first i thought it was a bright star, it was very bright, almost white, but it was moving very slowly. i thought it might be a helicopter, yet they fly very low in my area due to traffic reporting as i live by the hutch. but this object looked like a moving star it flew over the buildings towards the park, in a moment it kind of, or it appeared as though it was wiggling making moves that threw my balance off. yet there were no other lights to it, no red, blue, just white star looking floating through the aor object, as it was making its way the park, a helicopter was coming underneath its path, the object appeared to be really way high above as it fly over the helicopter. i was amazed because i was able to compare and contrast both flying one over the other, and there was no doubt it was a slow moving star like bright light object. when it king of wiggled i said its no way, ive never seen a plane, or any thing wiggled like that it caught me off guard as i said before my equilibriam was thrown off, and also i felt so connected to self and the object like i wasnt afraid, yet i just knew it was a ufo, and i felt a strange feeling this object was flown with intelligence. i kept going towards the park, the sun was just king peeking through in the horizon very little ligt, it slowly flew straight toward into the early morning light.....that was it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pelham Bay Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
